item.title: 一位经纪人的合作公寓房源有一个很大的缺点：噩梦般的邻居。"我发现门上贴着一张笔记本纸，上面潦草地写着：'别买这个！老鼠和虫子！'"
item.description:

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）在参议院留下的最大讽刺是，左翼憎恨他是因为他很有效率，而他自己的政党却没有意识到这一点
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The great irony of Mitch McConnell’s Senate legacy is that the left hates him because he’s effective, which his own party failed to appreciate https://t.co/JUKBue1R5h https://t.co/JUKBue1R5h

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 29, 2024
